full_summary:
# **Tender Announcement: Row Plot Seeder**
## Reference Number
WS4348393933-Doc4361360117

## Tender Details

* *Title*: Row Plot Seeder
* *Identifier*: 01633-240531 
* *Month and Year of Publication*: December 2023
* *Deadline for Submission:* January 18, 2024, at 14:00 EST

## Overview
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's (AAFC) Brandon Research and Development Centre requires one 7 Row Plot Seeder. Vendors can submit their quotes electronically through Ariba Discovery.

## Contract Details

* *Expected Commencement Date*: May 13, 2024
* *Expected Completion Date*: April 30, 2024
* *Status*: Expired

## Procurement Information
* *Notice Type*: Request for Proposal
* *Procurement Category*: Goods and Services (GD)
* *Procurement Method*: Competitive - Open Bidding
* *Trade Agreements*: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Requirements

* *Description*: A 7 Row Plot Seeder is required to be bid on. 
* *Contact Information* 
    * *Name*: Cao, Luke (SPAC/PSPC)
    * *Email*: luke.cao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Important

* Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 18, 2024 at 14:00 EST.
* All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
